inclusion.criterion: will be individually and randomly assigned to either treatment group or control group.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: sham control, electrical pulses of similar width and intensity, but much lower frequency compared to the active device will be administered.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: st visit - screening, enrollment and training on the application in diary mode
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stage 1 - Roll in phase The Roll-in is a period of 15 - 30 days in which at least two (2) and no more of eight (8) migraine attacks has been occurred.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: nd visit Following the Roll-in phase, the participants will arrive to the clinic and their compliance to the study procedures and eligibility to continue to the next phase will assessed.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant will be randomized into one of the two study group (Active or Sham device)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant will be trained on the device, the application (in diary and treatment modes), the treatment procedures and the key elements critical for the success of the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stage 2 - Parallel arms, double- blind treatment phase. Participants will be instructed to activate the device at onset of a qualifying migraine attack and manually adjust stimulation intensity to a level within the pre-defined range, where it is well perceived but not painful.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Via the smartphone application, each participant will be asked to rate his/her migraine pain
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Apply the Nerivio Migra as soon as possible following the onset of the migraine symptoms and NO LATER than 60 min from onset
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Refrain from taking any rescue medication 2 hours following the start of treatment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Perform the treatment for a period of at least 30 minutes (recommended treatment time is 45 minutes).
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject has other significant pain, medical or psychologic problems that in the opinion of the investigator may confound the study assessments
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has an implanted electrical and/or neurostimulator device (e.g. cardiac pacemaker or defibrillator, vagus nerve neurostimulator, deep brain stimulator, spinal stimulator, bone growth stimulator cochlear implant, Sphenopalatine ganglion stimulator or Occipital nerve stimulator).
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any use of Cannabis including medical use.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has >10 headache days per month.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject has undergone nerve block (occipital or other) in the head or neck within the last 2 weeks.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject is participating in any other clinical study.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The subject does not have the basic cognitive and motor skills needed to operate a smartphone.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has history of recurrent bilateral headache, diagnosed with migraine headache. She is under treatment.
